titleStmt.title: The speech of Sergeant Glanvill in the vpper Hovse of Parliament for peace and vnitie also shewing that the way to preserve peacc [sic] is to bee well provided for warre.
titleStmt.author: Glanville, John, Sir, 1586-1661.

notesStmt.note: Delivered in April 1640 at his confirmation as speaker of the House of Commons.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
